item.title: Taxonomic Description of the Family Solanaceae with Economic Importance
item.description:
Taxonomic Description of the Family Solanaceae with Economic Importance

The Solanaceae family, commonly known as the nightshade family, includes a variety of economically important plants. This document provides a comprehensive taxonomic description of the Solanaceae family and explores its economic significance.

1. Taxonomic Classification

The Solanaceae family belongs to the order Solanales and is characterized by specific morphological and genetic traits. Hereâ€™s a detailed taxonomic hierarchy:

  • Kingdom: Plantae
  • Clade: Angiosperms
  • Clade: Eudicots
  • Order: Solanales
  • Family: Solanaceae

1.1 Characteristics

The Solanaceae family exhibits the following defining characteristics:
